ygData.subject: Re: Charisma
ygData.msgSnippet: I traded a magic Insignia ring (+2 AC, +1 DEX??) for a magic medal (necklace +5 CHA). I bought from a Paladin that I think said he got it from a quest. Anyway
ygData.messageBody:
I traded a magic Insignia ring (+2 AC, +1 DEX??) for a magic medal
(necklace +5
CHA). I bought from a Paladin that I think said he got it from a quest.
Anyway I figured it was a good deal because I used to sell Insignia
rings for 2 plat each, but now they are everywhere and people are lucky
to get 3-5 gold for them.


-----Original Message-----
From: Jay [mailto:jayalan@...]
Sent: Wednesday, April 21, 1999 12:54 AM
To: eqenchanters@onelist.com
Subject: [eqenchanters] Charisma


From: Jay <jayalan@...>

How important is charisma? I only have 76, is there a way to raise it?
If not will it be that impotant down the road that I should ditch this
character for a new one with more charisma? I'd hate to do that, I'm
almost to level 7, but if it's going to hamper me down the road...

Let me know what ya think, thanks,
Jalaar...Solesuk Ro
